QuestData.Title: A Lesson in Bravery
QuestData.Description: Can you help teach me to be brave like you?$b$bWhen we played our prank on the witch we made a bunch of Leafy Tricksters angry. I think the witch did something to them.$b$bCan you show me how you stand up to them?
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat 8 Leafy Tricksters south of the Jade Witch Hut.
